metadata.name: Job Description
metadata.value:
Pentaho is looking for a talented Software Engineer to develop and maintain all parts of the Pentaho Community and Enterprise software suite. Qualified individuals must have a solid background in the fundamentals of computer science, and some background in distributed computing, large scale data processing, performance tuning and user interface design. The successful candidate will work with architects, product management, usability, quality, documentation, and the open source community to enhance and advance all portions of the Pentaho software suite.
DUTIES
â€¢	Develop and test Java software components and classes as part of the Engineering Team using the Scrum development process
â€¢	Assist the technical support team in the isolation and resolution of customer issues
â€¢	Author developer documentation and participate in the development of end-user documentation
â€¢	Mentor and advise junior team members
â€¢	Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical members of the project team
â€¢	Support consultants, partners, and the open source community
â€¢	Simultaneously handle multiple tasks and projects
REQUIRED SKILLS
â€¢	Professional experience in troubleshooting, maintaining, or developing data-driven applications connected to relations databases, XML sources, web services, flat file, and big data driven backend system.
â€¢	5+ Years experience in Java Object Oriented Software Development
â€¢	Experience with multi-threaded / multi-user server-side software development
â€¢	Experience analyzing code performance and implementing performance improvement.
â€¢	Experience with software development best practices and design patterns
â€¢	Experience with web service technologies (REST, JAX-WS, etc.)
â€¢	Experience with scalability analysis and performance monitoring and measuring techniques
â€¢	Experience with Windows and Unix/Linux
â€¢	Experience with build related tools such as Maven, Ant, and/or Ivy
â€¢	Experience with testing frameworks such as JUnit and Mockito
â€¢	Must be able to quickly understand technical and business requirements and be able to translate into technical implementation
â€¢	4-year University degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field
â€¢	Reliable, self-motivated, and focused on high quality delivery of work products
â€¢	Skilled in navigating the dynamics of working as part of a team
â€¢	Excellent written and verbal communication skills in a team environment
DESIRED SKILLS
â€¢	Experience with modular software and services management frameworks such as OSGi and Spring
â€¢	Experience working with Data Integration / ETL and Big Data concepts
â€¢	Knowledge of Business Intelligence concepts including ETL, OLAP, and Reporting
â€¢	Experience with JavaScript MVC frameworks (Backbone, Angular, Ember, Knockout)
â€¢	Experience with RDBMS systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, H2, HSQLDB, Oracle, SQL Server 
â€¢	Understanding of agile or other iterative software development methodologies

title: Product Development - Intermediate Software Engineer - Java + BigData
content:
Weâ€™re Hitachi Vantara, a global infrastructure business. Our people are the force of meaningful progress. We enable the incredible with data â€“ from taking theme park fans on magical rides, conserving natural resources, protecting rainforests to saving lives. We empower businesses to automate, optimize and advance innovation. Together, we create a sustainable future for all. 
Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to inspire he future. We donâ€™t expect you to â€˜fitâ€™ every requirement â€“ your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally important to us.The Role
We are seeking Java / Bigdata Engineer Responsibilities 
Hitachi is looking for a talented Software Engineer to develop and maintain all parts of the Pentaho Community and Enterprise software suite. Qualified individuals must have a solid background in the fundamentals of computer science, and some background in distributed computing, large scale data processing, performance tuning and user interface design. The successful candidate will work with architects, product management, usability, quality, documentation, and the open source community to enhance and advance all portions of the Pentaho software suite.
DUTIES
Develop and test Java software components and classes as part of the Engineering Team using the Scrum development process
Assist the technical support team in the isolation and resolution of customer issues
Author developer documentation and participate in the development of end-user documentation
Mentor and advise junior team members
Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical members of the project team
Support consultants, partners, and the open source community
Simultaneously handle multiple tasks and projects
What youâ€™ll bring
Professional experience in troubleshooting, maintaining, or developing data-driven applications connected to relations databases, XML sources, web services, flat file, and big data driven backend system.
3+ Years experience in Java Object Oriented Software Development
Experience with multi-threaded / multi-user server-side software development
Experience analyzing code performance and implementing performance improvement.
Experience with software development best practices and design patterns
Experience with web service technologies (REST, JAX-WS, etc.)
Experience with scalability analysis and performance monitoring and measuring techniques
Experience with Windows and Unix/Linux
Experience with build related tools such as Maven, Ant, and/or Ivy
Experience with testing frameworks such as JUnit and Mockito
Must be able to quickly understand technical and business requirements and be able to translate into technical implementation
4-year University degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field
Reliable, self-motivated, and focused on high quality delivery of work products
Skilled in navigating the dynamics of working as part of a team
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in a team environment
DESIRED SKILLS
Experience with modular software and services management frameworks such as OSGi and Spring
Experience working with Data Integration / ETL and Big Data concepts
Knowledge of Business Intelligence concepts including ETL, OLAP, and Reporting
Experience with JavaScript MVC frameworks (Backbone, Angular, Ember, Knockout)
Experience with RDBMS systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, H2, HSQLDB, Oracle, SQL Server
Understanding of agile or other iterative software development methodologies 
Qualifications
Any Engineering GraduateChampioning diversity, equity, and inclusion 
Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team.
How we look after you
We want to help you take care of your today and tomorrow â€“ at home and at work. Which is why we offer industry-leading benefits that go far beyond compensation. That means support, services, and resources that also take care of your holistic health and wellbeing. Weâ€™re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. Here, youâ€™ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. Weâ€™re also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent).
About us
Weâ€™re a global team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion for insight to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can a make positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can inspire the future, this is the place to fulfil your purpose and achieve your potential.
Weâ€™re proud to say weâ€™re an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.

demographic_questions.description:
At Hitachi Vantara, we value the diversity of our workforce and strive to foster an inclusive environment in which talent from all backgrounds can thrive, bringing their unique contributions to our culture and success. We are an equal opportunity employer and seek to strengthen our hiring practices by identifying and mitigating the potential for bias in our assessment and selection processes.

Below is a set of voluntary demographic questions that, if you choose to complete, will provide aggregated data to inform our hiring strategy and help us uphold our commitment to inclusive hiring.  Your responses, or choice to not respond, will in no way be linked to your specific application and will not be used to inform the hiring decision.

Our company does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression or veteran status. In order to track the effectiveness of our recruiting efforts and ensure we consider the needs of all our employees, please consider the following optional questions.

questions.label: Which age group describes you?
Which category best describes you?

answer_options.label: South Asian (For example, Bangladeshi, Bhutanese, Indian)
East Asian (For example - Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Filipino, Indonesian, Vietnamese)
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

questions.label: Would you describe yourself as having a physical impairment or disability?
Do you consider yourself a member of the LGBTQIA+ community?
How do you currently describe your gender identity?
Do you identify as transgender?
First Name
Last Name
Email
Phone
Resume/CV
Cover Letter
Current Address (Street Address, City, State, Country, Zip Code)
LinkedIn Profile
Are you legally authorized to work in the country where this job is located?
Will you now, or in the future, require sponsorship for employment?
If yes, do you have dual citizenship (i.e., a citizen of another country) or legal permanent residency in another country?

questions.description:
Please click HERE to read the Hitachi Vantara Data Protection Privacy Statement. 

By checking the box labeled “I Consent” on this submission page and submitting my personal data to the Company, I confirm that I have read, understand, and consent to the terms and conditions, including those which are provided via hyperlinks on this page, in which my personal data will be processed by the Company.
questions.label: Data Protection Notification and Consent Form*

Are you a citizen from one of the countries listed here?
(Needed to determine if export authorization is required).
If yes, please list such country(ies) below. If no, respond "no"

Do you currently, or have you ever worked for any company within the Hitachi Group? 
E.g., Hitachi Rail, Hitachi Energy etc.
If yes, please specify the Hitachi company name. If no, respond "no"
